Description/Key_Features: Cast aluminum construction with prismatic acrylic or polycarbonate refractor (Type III or V). T1 advanced LED optical system with Cree LEDs. Universal dimmable DALI-2 D4i driver. 20kV/10kA surge protection. KingCoat SuperDurable finish.
Mounting_Details: Mounts to 3.5" max diameter x 3.5" max length tenon.
